WorkItem.ClosedComment: The Evis Glyph was fixed earlier and Killing Spree and its Glyph have been implemented now as well.
WorkItem.Description: Black Magic No longer has any value. I myself have done extensive testing and found that Executioner MH and Black Magic OH to be optimal at gear levels of iLvl 245 and above.
WorkItem.Summary: [Rogue] Black Magic Enchant has lost it's value, Glyphs of Eviscerate and Killing Spree have no value

Comments.Message: Also Glyph of Eviserate and Glyph of Killing Spree are not showing any change in dps.

Black Magic: I'll quote Aldriana on this one:
Q: So I heard that Black Magic works off poisons, and haste is a good stat for us, so I was wondering...
A: ...if it was any good? Short answer: no. Long answer: nooooooooooooooooooooooooo.

Regardless of that answer, I might add it back in but it's not high on my prio list.

Glyph of Eviscerate: The problem is not that the Glyph doesn't add damage, it's that Envenom is better than Eviscerate according to the optimizer, even for combat builds. You can see this for yourself by using Eviscerate in your custom rotation, checking/unchecking Glyph of Evis should then change your custom rotation DPS.
Work in progress :)

Glyph of Killing Spree: Killing Spree has not been implemented (yet).
Also with the Glyph  of Tricks of the Trade still doesn't have any change in dps. Could you look at this?
Glyph of Tricks of the Trade doesn't increase the damage output of the Rogue.
Black Magic has a value again.
